name: Nimble Color
description:
Find out how focused and fast you are!
You can clear the screen.

Each overlap, one tap, and it’s gone!

Just a single tap to start, and you’re ready to go.

Nimble Color is a one-tap game. Dismiss the shapes, one by another until the screen is completely clear. Each dynamic shape will overlap a shape of the same kind, size and color.

As far as you proceed in the game, the shapes will become more colourful, the speed will change and it will get more challenging.



Game Features:
◆ Simple one finger control.
◆ Tapping anywhere on the screen is enabled.
◆ 120 unique levels.
◆ No ads, no in-app purchases.
